item.title: 尼日利亚巨型新炼油厂发布燃料装载视频

item.description: 土耳其中央银行在 2023 年的亏损额为 8182 亿里拉（250 亿美元），这与多年来因利率大幅提高和政府支持的旨在保护储户免受货币贬值影响的储蓄计划成本而带来的利润相比发生了逆转。【原文：The Turkish central bank had a loss of 818.2 billion liras ($25 billion) in 2023, a reversal from years of profits driven by sharply higher interest rates and the cost of a government-backed savings program designed to shield depositors against currency depreciation.】
